text: Soultaker is the second EP from German futurepop band Blutengel. It was released as a single CD and 2x CD limited edition. The bonus disc to the limited edition is a recording of a live performance from K17, Berlin on 22/23 May 2009 entitled Live in Berlin. ==Track listing== ==References== ==External links== *Soultaker at Discogs Category:2009 EPs Category:Blutengel albums
title: Soultaker (EP)
